name: Hole New Game
description:
Game submission for Brackey's jam 2020.1.
Theme: Holes.

Description: Find the Advanced Tech Gun Prototypes and make good use of them to solve puzzles and find the resource cache! and hole-ot more!

Controls:

Move: [WASD]

Aim and Shoot: [Mouse]

switch guns: [1], [2] and [3] key

[R] to back to game and [Escape] to go back to menu.

3 Endings(sadly 1 ending got bugged.)!!  could have been more puzzles and endings if I didn't have tooth surgery this week so only worked 3-4 days. 

SFX  and Music: Fell in the hole.

Assets were taken from Unity Asset Hole and gun models from Brackey's site. 

Scripts are all mine except for silly dialogue box using fungus.

Baked by: GTX 1060

everything else by: Arc

Thank you!

Play a web build  with sounds here.
